entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
